variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Deidentified Subject ID

variable.name: SAMPID
variable.description: Deidentified Subject Sample ID

variable.name: Run_#
variable.description: Same Sample ran more than once

variable.name: Sample
variable.description: Type of Sample

variable.name: Visit_Virome
variable.description: Virome - Visit

variable.name: Visit_Vir_Fever
variable.description: Virome - Fever - Visit

variable.name: Reason_visit
variable.description: Reason participant was getting blood drawn

variable.name: Type_Surgery
variable.description: If participant having surgery - type of surgery

variable.name: Patient_Status
variable.description: Symptomatic or asymptomatic

variable.name: Active_Fever
variable.description: Active Fever or no fever

variable.name: Type of Study
variable.description: Category participant fits in for this sample visit

variable.name: Temp
variable.description: Temperature (degree Celsius ) of the participant during collection of sample

variable.name: S_BP
variable.description: Systolic - BP of the participant during collection of sample

variable.name: D_BP
variable.description: Diastolic - BP of the participant during collection of sample

variable.name: Pulse
variable.description: Pulse of the participant during collection of sample

variable.name: HR_resting
variable.description: HR (heart rate) of the participant during collection of sample

variable.name: Weight_kg
variable.description: Weight of the participant during collection of sample

variable.name: Sick contacts
variable.description: Has the participant been around sick contacts

variable.name: Study table.Sick contacts_time.Value
variable.description: When has the participant been around sick contacts

variable.name: Daycare/school_start
variable.description: Has the participant started a new Daycare or School

variable.name: Daycare/school_time
variable.description: Time frame when started new Daycare/School

variable.name: Travel_past_mth
variable.description: Has the participant traveled past month
